channel.name: Intergy_outbound_ADT_Gensys_Dev

properties.select: select CNAD.CaseNumberADTDetailID,CNAD.CaseNumberDetailID,MessageControlID,REPLACE(MessageControlID,'glm_','') AS MessageID, FORMAT(CNAD.CreatedDate,'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS CreatedDate,MessageStatus,CND.CaseNumber from CaseNumberADTDetail CNAD INNER JOIN dbo.CaseNumberDetail CND ON CNAD.CaseNumberDetailID=CND.CaseNumberDetailID where (MessageStatus = 'New' or MessageStatus = 'Update') AND CND.IsPrimarius=0 order by CNAD.CreatedDate asc

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Call Stored procedure to fetch patient detials
Construct MSH Segment
Construct EVN Segment
Fetch Value from Result Set
Construct PID Segment
Construct PV1 Segment
Construct GT1 and IN1 Segment

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
